summary.span: 允許以單一清單顯示多個集合和項目。

span.span: Enables multiple collections and items to be displayed as a single list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可包含項目，例如字串、 物件、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]節點、 項目，以及其他集合。 can contain items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, as well as other collections. 使用中的資料來產生其內容根據其。An uses the data in the to generate its content according to its . 如需使用詳細資訊物件繫結至集合時，請參閱 < 繫結至的 [集合] 區段[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about using objects to bind to collections, see the Binding to Collections section of the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
